message.name: INF_PROVIDERDEDUCTION_XRV_ASSOCIATED_PRODUCT
message.locale: No %1c has been configured for the product %2c. Please contact your administrator.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERDEDUCTION_XRV_PROVIDER_CLOSED_PROVIDERDEDUCTION_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: The provider, %1s, is closed. The provider deduction cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERDEDUCTION_XRV_PERCENTAGE_GREATER_THAN_MAXIMUM_PERCENTAGE
message.locale: Percentage, %1n, must not be greater than the maximum percentage, %2n, specified in administration.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERDEDUCTION_XRV_STARTDATE_GREATER_THAN_PROVIDER_STARTDATE
message.locale: Deduction start date must not be before the start date of the provider.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERDEDUCTION_FV_PERCENTAGE_NOT_IN_RANGE
message.locale: Percentage must be greater than 0 and less than 100.
